title: Yue Wu
description: Computer science student at UC San Diego. New Media Artist.
detail3: Current Location: San Diego, California, US
detail4: I am currently a Master's student in Computer Science at UC San Diego. I also earned my Bachelor's degree here. I minored in Visual Arts at Computing and Arts. I am proficient in Unity programming and web programming. During my spare time, I love listening to metal music and playing video games.
resume1: This resume is about my experiences as a computer science student.
portfolio1: This portfolio is about my experiences as a ICAM minor student.
portfolio2: Being a computer scientist, I love to explore the artistic side of technology. I tend to imagine what our future might look like and how I can express it using my code.
